title: Who’s your Daddy?
author: VD
content_html:
I don’t think that chant is going to survive the 2004 season, at least not at Yankee Stadium. I’m not a Red Sox fan – actually, I’m not a baseball fan – but it’s sure nice to see the Yankees go down in flames, as a $180 million payroll managed a choke of historic proportions. Congrats to the Big Man of Multiman too; here’s hoping that he collects the Cy Young that’s been eluding him so long.

It sure looks like a good sports weekend. Arsenal vs. United on Saturday followed by the Vikings asphalting the Titans on Sunday. What was that I said about Tennessee’s window of opportunity, Nate? Closed….
content_text:
I don’t think that chant is going to survive the 2004 season, at least not at Yankee Stadium. I’m not a Red Sox fan – actually, I’m not a baseball fan – but it’s sure nice to see the Yankees go down in flames, as a $180 million payroll managed a choke of historic proportions.  Congrats to the Big Man of Multiman too; here’s hoping that he collects the Cy Young that’s been eluding him so long.
It sure looks like a good sports weekend.  Arsenal vs. United on Saturday followed by the Vikings asphalting the Titans on Sunday.  What was that I said about Tennessee’s window of opportunity, Nate?  Closed….
